# The `VPBlendRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe for vectorizing a phi-node as a sequence of mask-based select instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

A recipe for vectorizing a phi-node as a sequence of mask-based select instructions.

Definition at line 2497 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### VPBlendRecipe() {#a06a43099cff6ce62ba54dbdb91b394c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::VPBlendRecipe::VPBlendRecipe (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Phi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> &#42; &gt; Operands)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The blend operation is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> of the incoming values and of their respective masks, ordered &#91;I0, M0, I1, M1, I2, M2, ...&#93;.

Note that M0 can be omitted (implied by passing an odd number of operands) in which case all other incoming values are merged into it.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l02503">2503</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
